item.title: Jakarta – The City Everyone Loves To Hate
item.description: ‘URGH! – Don’t go to Jakarta, its awful!‘ This is an all too familiar phrase from travelers regarding Indonesia’s capital. The irony though? Most of them haven’t even been…. Jakarta History Museum, Fatahillah Square We flew into ‘dangerous’ Jakarta from Singapore. Whilst I enjoyed my time in Singapore, I was beginning to yearn the challenges of old school Asia and started to get excited about our visit to Indonesia. Unlike squeaky clean Singapore, Indonesia is raw and still developing.
